entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Self-contained publish without restore doesn't work with --arch/-a argument but does work with -r/--runtime #36334
  • Publishing container images leaves 'orphaned' images from previous builds #36304
  • Can we finally remove "// See https://aka.ms/new-console-template for more information" from the console template? #36293

Closed

  • dotnet tool install attempts to install an unlisted package on nuget.org #32092
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • 8.0.100-rc.1 dotnet tool update fails #36015
  • Regression: `dotnet tool restore` with a `dotnet-tools.json` is broken in .NET 8 RC 2 #35989
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • .NET8 RC1 dotnet tool install <package> does not work when nuget.org is blocked #35517
  • SDK needs newer version of format #36219

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert skipped tests due to VS 17.8-p3 #36337
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When logging message-level messages strip code so that external tools don't flag the message as a warning #36329
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36297
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Validate attribute type defines when excluded #36282
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat, 8.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] GenAPI - Emit attribute type defines when excluded #36284
    Servicing-consider, Area-GenAPI, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36280
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add --no-http-cache option and hide --no-cache option for dotnet restore command #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36149
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
